mapper.select:
select T.ID,T.TRANSFORMER_NO,T.DESK_NAME,T.RATED_CAPACITY,TA.TRANSFORMER_ASSETS_NO,TA.TRANSFORMER_MODEL_TYPE from TRANSFORMER_INFO T LEFT JOIN TRANSFORMER_ASSETS_INFO TA ON T.TRANSFORMER_ASSETS_ID = TA.ID
and TRANSFORMER_ASSETS_NO like CONCAT('%',#{transformerAssetsNo},'%')
and TRANSFORMER_NO like CONCAT('%',#{transformerNo},'%')
and DESK_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{deskName},'%')
and T.ID NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT(TRANSFORMER_ID) FROM TRANSFORMER_METER_REL TM where METER_ID in (${idList} ))

select T.ID,T.TRANSFORMER_NO,T.DESK_NAME,T.RATED_CAPACITY, TA.TRANSFORMER_ASSETS_NO,TA.TRANSFORMER_MODEL_TYPE, TM.TRANSFORMER_GROUP_NO,TM.MS_TYPE
from TRANSFORMER_METER_REL TM LEFT JOIN TRANSFORMER_INFO T ON TM.TRANSFORMER_ID = T.ID LEFT JOIN TRANSFORMER_ASSETS_INFO TA ON T.TRANSFORMER_ASSETS_ID = TA.ID LEFT JOIN METER_INFO M ON TM.METER_ID = M.ID where TM.METER_ID in ( ${idList} )

select TMR.ID,M.METER_NO,M.METER_NAME,U.USER_NAME,M.METER_TYPE, TMR.TRANS_LOST_TYPE,TMR.TRANS_LOST_NUM,TMR.MS_TYPE, T.TRANSFORMER_NO,T.DESK_NAME from TRANSFORMER_METER_REL TMR LEFT JOIN METER_INFO M ON TMR.METER_ID = M.ID LEFT JOIN TRANSFORMER_INFO T ON TMR.TRANSFORMER_ID = T.ID LEFT JOIN USER_INFO U ON M.USER_ID = U.ID
and TMR.TRANSFORMER_ID = #{transformerId}
mapper.delete:
delete from TRANSFORMER_METER_REL
and METER_ID in ( ${idList})
mapper.select:
select TM.* from TRANSFORMER_METER_REL TM
and TM.TRANSFORMER_GROUP_NO = #{transformerGroupNo}
